profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Global Senior Leadership Team for Talent Acquisition I am responsible for the end-2-end Recruitment Operations for Philips.
I lead a team that is responsible for delivering a world class recruiting process, an innovative TA Technology landscape and a full suite of reporting & analytics solutions. We consult TA Leadership all over the globe to continuously improve the productivity of our recruiting operation.

We drive change and improvement through 5 focus areas:

• Insights:
Design and deploy data solutions & advisory that enables the TA organization to rationalize recruiting decisions.

• Experience:
Improve and standardize our Global TA processes to drive efficiency, compliancy and one seamless candidate, hiring manager and recruiter experience.

• Total Workforce Demand 
Integrate the contingent workforce channel and Total Workforce advisory in the total Talent Acquisition concept.

• Innovation:
Drive innovation in the TA Tech space by connecting TA Strategy, functional requirements and market trends to the HR IT Strategy.

• Organization Effectiveness:
Design an actionable connection between our AOP (budget), our req volumes (forecasted workload) and our TA formation (capacity). This to become a more fluid, scalable and productive TA Organization.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of TA Optimization

profile_positions.description:
“ Getting work done the right way, at the right cost, at the right location” 

As part of the senior leadership team of “Total Workforce Demand Management” in this role I have delivered a total hire strategy focused on agility and value through creation of a holistic workforce demand management program, to include, employees, contingent workers and statement of work.

I have lead and developed and roll-out the workforce buy strategy and made a significant contribution to building the global contingent workforce demand management. 

In this role I have created the Demand Modeling Tool. The DMT provides Total Workforce Insights to HR & TA business partners to strengthen their dialogue with the business and guide them in making better Total Workforce decisions. 

• Managing the creation of the Workforce Buy Strategy model.
• Managing the creation & implementation of the manager Decision Tree.
• Provision of relevant Data & Analytics to support the TWDM strategy and Workforce Buy model.
• Functional leadership for TWDM systems.
• Managing various meaningful (global) projects and stakeholders as required in the TWDM portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Global TA Director Workforce Demand Management

profile_positions.description:
As Recruiting Operations Manager I am enabling the strategic direction of Philips Talent Acquisition for EMEA by focusing on building world-class operations while balancing efficiency and quality. In addition to processes and tooling, I am responsible for data analytics to include analysis leading to predictive indicators in the Talent Acquisition space. 
 
My responsibilities:

• Managing of a team of 17 recruiting coordinators and analyst, providing administrative and analytical support to the EMEA Talent Acquisition team.
• Represent Talent Acquisition in HR projects and boards.
• Business Ownership of Talent Acquisition related technology and tools.
• Recruitment processes: establishing and driving efficiencies.
• Complete adoption of and driving the Global Way-of-Working.
• Management Reporting Dashboard (KPI's).
• Participation in Talent Acquisition related projects.
• Contribution to HR & HR-IT Strategy.
• Customer Surveys for Talent Acquisition.
• Manage relationships with vendors in EMEA, and other global vendors as required.
• Contribute to Annual Operating Plan development and ongoing management.
• Assisting in the integration of acquired companies and emerging markets as applicable. 
• Support of out of scope markets; tooling, technology, process.

Main achievements:
- Relocate TA Operations EMEA team to a shared service location in Poland.
- Implementation of Workday Staffing in the EMEA Region.
- Design and implementation of Global TA Dashboard.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Recruiting Operations EMEA

profile_positions.description:
In this role I was responsible for designing the Talent Acquisition strategy 2020 for Deloitte in the Netherlands. As a project manager I lead teams and change in achieving our recruitment aspirations.

In it’s journey to staff all their assignments through the effort of their internal and external network Deloitte has to strengthen existing relations and develop new relations and collaborations in the total Deloitte network.

Networks and relations I developed in order to source the best talent for Deloitte are: 

• Deloittes network on the labor market | candidate relation management - database marketing - business involvement - pipeline management.
• Deloittes network of flexible workforce | designing flexdesk Deloitte NL - engagement strategy flex.
• Deloittes network of current workforce | referral - internal mobility - international mobility.

Other responsibities in this role were:
• Managing the sourcingdesk Deloitte NL.
• Maintain and innovate the IT landscape for Talent Acquisition (f/e ATS, Assessment tooling).
• Changing Deloittes sourcing and selection to a more proactive and data driven process.  
• Integration of Talent Acquisition with Talent Management and Learning.
• Recruitment reporting, analytics and research.
• I was a member of the Global Recruitment Council and founder of the European TA Table.
